00050         virtual bool on_key_release_event(GdkEventKey* event);

00059         // A window is mapped when it becomes visible on the screen
00060         virtual bool on_map_event(GdkEventAny* event);
00061         // A window is unmapped when it becomes invisible on the screen.
00062         virtual bool on_unmap_event(GdkEventAny* event);
